document.full_text: iran's constitutional watchdog has said president mahmoud ahmadinejad's decision to appoint himself caretaker oil minister is illegal, the semi-official fars news agency reported on friday.
document.title: ahmadinejad oil ministry move illegal: iran watchdog
lines_and_colors: iran's constitutional watchdog has said president mahmoud ahmadinejad's decision to appoint himself caretaker oil minister is illegal, the semi-official fars news agency reported on friday.
